hard hat.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a protective hat, worn especially by workers in places where buildings are being built
hard hat.translation[1].definitions[0].d: a protective hat worn by builders
hard hat.translation[1].definitions[0].e: Hard hats are now required by the Occupational Safety and Health Administration for all construction workers.
hard hat.translation[1].definitions[1].d: a worker in the building industry
hard hat.translation[1].definitions[1].e: People working in television tend not to feel at home with hard hats and blue collars.
